code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant ReservationSvc
    participant Kafka
    participant PaymentSvc
    participant TicketingSvc

    User->>ReservationSvc: 예약 요청
    ReservationSvc->>ReservationSvc: 예약 데이터 저장 (PENDING)
    ReservationSvc->>Kafka: reservation.created

    Kafka->>PaymentSvc: consume reservation.created
    PaymentSvc->>PaymentSvc: 결제 시도

    alt 결제 성공
        PaymentSvc->>Kafka: payment.completed
        Kafka->>TicketingSvc: consume payment.completed
        TicketingSvc->>TicketingSvc: 발권 시도

        alt 발권 성공
            TicketingSvc->>Kafka: ticket.issued
            Kafka->>ReservationSvc: 최종 상태 → COMPLETED
        else 발권 실패
            TicketingSvc->>Kafka: ticket.failed
            Kafka->>ReservationSvc: 보상 트랜잭션 → 예약 취소
            Kafka->>PaymentSvc: 보상 트랜잭션 → 결제 취소
        end

    else 결제 실패
        PaymentSvc->>Kafka: payment.failed
        Kafka->>ReservationSvc: 보상 트랜잭션 → 예약 취소
    endㅌ
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
